TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi DataGridComboBoxColumn extends System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn

summary.span: 表示一个 列，该列在其单元格中承载 控件。

span.span: Represents a column that hosts controls in its cells.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于显示有一组要从中选择的项 (如枚举) 的数据。Use to display data where there is a set of items to choose from, such as an enumeration. 允许用户从下拉列表中选择项。 allows users to select an item from a drop-down list. 下图显示了。The following illustration shows a . ![DataGridComboBoxColumn](~/add/media/ndp-datagridcombobox.png "DataGridComboBoxColumn")![A DataGridComboBoxColumn](~/add/media/ndp-datagridcombobox.png "A DataGridComboBoxColumn") 若要填充下拉列表, 请首先使用以下选项之一设置的属性:To populate the drop-down list, first set the property for the by using one of the following options: - 静态资源。A static resource. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[StaticResource 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/staticresource-markup-extension.md)。For more information, see [StaticResource Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/staticresource-markup-extension.md). - X:Static 的代码实体。An x:Static code entity. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [x:Static Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension.md)。For more information, see [x:Static Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-static-markup-extension.md). - 类型的内联集合。An inline collection of types. 设置后, 将中的选定项绑定到该单元格所在的行的数据项。 Once the is set, bind the selected item in the to the data item for the row that the cell is in. 您可以使用以下属性之一设置绑定:You can set the binding by using one of the following properties: |PropertyProperty|说明Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||设置当前选定项的文本的绑定路径。Sets the binding path of the text for the currently selected item.| ||设置当前选定对象的绑定路径。Sets the binding path of the object that is currently selected.| ||将绑定路径设置为属性指定的选定项的值。Sets the binding path to the value of the selected item specified by the property.| 当属性设置为`true`时, 用户无法编辑列, 并且它们将无法看到下拉列表。 When the property is set to `true`, users cannot edit the column and they will not be able to see the drop-down list. 如果要显示其他类型的数据, 则提供以下列类型:If you want to display other types of data, provides the following column types: |列名称Column Type|数据显示Data Display| |-----------------|------------------| ||用于显示 URI 数据。Use to display URI data.| ||用于显示布尔数据。Use to display Boolean data.| ||用于显示文本。Use to display text.| 如果要使用中的其他控件, 则可以使用创建自己的列类型。If you want to use other controls in your , you can create your own column types by using . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用枚举的值在列中填充每个的下拉列表。The following example shows how to populate the drop-down list for each in the column with the values of an enumeration. 下拉列表中的选定项通过将属性设置为每行中显示的对象的属性进行绑定。The selected item in the drop-down list is bound by setting the property to the property of the object displayed in each row. [!code-xaml[DataGrid_CustomColumns#ComboBox1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_customcolumns/csharp/window1.xaml#combobox1)] [!code-xaml[DataGrid_CustomColumns#ComboBox2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_customcolumns/csharp/window1.xaml#combobox2)] [!code-csharp[DataGrid_CustomColumns#Top](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_customcolumns/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#top)] [!code-vb[DataGrid_CustomColumns#Top](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_customcolumns/vb/window1.xaml.vb#top)] [!code-csharp[DataGrid_CustomColumns#All2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_customcolumns/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#all2)] [!code-vb[DataGrid_CustomColumns#All2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_customcolumns/vb/window1.xaml.vb#all2)] [!code-csharp[DataGrid_CustomColumns#CustomerClass](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_customcolumns/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#customerclass)] [!code-vb[DataGrid_CustomColumns#CustomerClass](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_customcolumns/vb/window1.xaml.vb#customerclass)] [!code-csharp[DataGrid_CustomColumns#Enum](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_customcolumns/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#enum)] [!code-vb[DataGrid_CustomColumns#Enum](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_customcolumns/vb/window1.xaml.vb#enum)]
